meanings.definition: A person who makes an effort or tries to do something.
meanings.sent1: The attempters in the race gave their best effort to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The attempters in the group project worked together to solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: The attempters in the cooking competition accidentally used salt instead of sugar!
meanings.sent4: The attempters in the talent show shone like stars on stage.
meanings.sent5: The attempters in the spelling bee spelled each word with determination.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in trying to achieve a goal or complete a task.
meanings.sent1: The attempters in the marathon trained hard to cross the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The attempters in the business meeting discussed strategies to increase sales.
meanings.sent3: The attempters in the dance class tried to do the salsa but ended up doing the cha-cha!
meanings.sent4: The attempters in the art competition painted their dreams on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The attempters in the science fair presented their projects with enthusiasm.
